title: Bug 128359: Incorrect logic when adding a filter to a table on the layout
description: We observed that the dataset initially contains 10 records (DataResultA).
EB: When dragging the dataset onto the layout and setting another filter (FilterB) on the table, the actual result is that the filter is applied to DataResultA. The expected result is that the filter should be applied to DataResultB.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a report and add a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set a filter (FilterA) on the dataset, which narrows down the dataset to 6 records (DataResultB).
3. Drag the dataset to the layout and set another filter (FilterB) on the table.
